name: Recruiting Plum
description:
Who needs a V-Tuber lore video when you can make .... a V-Tuber lore video GAME!! 

Hello! My name is Plumarielle and I am not a game developer. I have never written a game, or programmed a game, or drawn art for a game ... until I randomly decided to do this for my debut as VTuber with NexStage !! 

I hope you can enjoy this silly little game. Its pretty short, so you should be able to unlock all three endings! Please let me know on twitter (@Plumarielle_NS) which ending you get first !!!
